lines.text: Mr. Martin, I'm gonna stay right here if I sit all day and night until someone comes along to take me to Pickwick.
Let me tell you, Miss Hall, Pickwick is nuthin but a dried up ghost town and no place for a little filly like you.

[ssrcastically as a backhanded complenent to Pawnee]
Must keep you pretty busy keepin' all that stuff polished up!

[to Tim and Sandy]
Well, come on, Rough Riders!
Watch for THE ROUGH RIDERS when they ride again.
